name: Dodge Bolt
description:
Play as Spark or Max Amp and do your best to take down your opponent by pelting them with balls! Play the high ground for an explosive powerup. The first player to successfully peg their opponent three times wins! The game requires two players with controllers to play.

This game was developed over the course of two weeks for a rapid prototype project at FIEA.

Gabe - Programmer

Leah - Background, UI, Environmental Artist

Nicholas - Character and Animation Artist

Thomas - Programmer

Elijah - Level Designer
